PtSituationElement.Summary: TRACK MAINTENANCE Until Sep 28, Monday to Friday Downtown [B] [D] [F] [M] trains run at a slower speed in the area of W 4 St-Washington Sq in Manhattan

PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE
Until Sep 28, Monday to Friday
Downtown [B] [D] [F] [M] trains run at a slower speed in the area of W 4 St-Washington Sq in Manhattan


You may experience longer wait times, additional crowding and delays on [B] [D] [F] and [M] trains as we repair switches in the area of W 4 St-Washington Sq.

PtSituationElement.Summary: TRACK MAINTENANCE Until Sep 28, Monday to Friday [F] Rush hour service reduced to accommodate switch work in the area of W 4 St in Manhattan
PtSituationElement.Description: TRACK MAINTENANCE Until Sep 28, Monday to Friday [F] Rush hour service reduced to accommodate switch work in the area of W 4 St in Manhattan
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE
Until Sep 28, Monday to Friday
[F] Rush hour service reduced to accommodate switch work in the area of W 4 St in Manhattan


Two AM rush hour [F] trains will not run between 7:30 AM and 8:30 AM.
Two PM rush hour [F] trains will not run between 4 PM and 4:45 PM.

You may experience longer wait times, additional crowding and delays as we repair switches in the area of W 4 St-Washington Sq.
